guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
This whole article is basically just "people with a vagina just need to shut up, be lesser in every way, have no autonomy, and get a husband to rule over them while they have lots of kiddies and do pointless housework, but this totally isn't lesser or anything, it's just different!". Then they cite the pastoral epistles (not written by who they say they are), an interpolation in 1 Corinthians, and an out-of-context quote in Genesis as proof texts. Then then proceed to quote 10x more from "church fathers" who had an obvious agenda to make Christianity conform to Greco-Roman values. I also find it funny how they contrast the "biblical" narrative of woman only exists to be fucked, slave, and birth your kiddies with the "Darwinist" belief that the sexes are equal...when it's the reverse, as Charles Darwin used evolution as a way to claim that females are naturally inferior to males and that this was proper, eerily similar to the pagans' and Roman church fathers' beliefs about conforming to what is "natural", "women are pieces of meat" being one of them. Meanwhile all evidence we have shows that early Christian communities thought the opposite, which would have been considered off the wall insanity in the ancient world.

They also say that women need men but not the other way around, which is just a flat out lie. Every study shows that most men are only happy with a woman, but women can do fine without men. This is because males perform a specialized function of giving away sperm and providing for and protecting their clan. Their value is not inherent, but in what they do, and thus they need a mate and people to support; their purpose in life is external and collectivist. However the female is more generalized and capable of both individual pursuits and family life, so they don't absolutely need a mate to find purpose. And since the writers of this article have a habit of reading too much into Genesis, it should be noted that it was the man who was so lonely without a companion, and it was the man who needed help.
